QuestData.Title: Seed of a Thought
QuestData.Description:
Within wildseeds, spirits slumber and grow. But so too can catalysts, when seeds take the place of spirits.
Seed Merchant Daybreak trades in such seeds. She can supply you with the ones you seek. Choose one to plant within a wildseed.
The forest holds its breath and awaits your choice.
QuestData.LogDescription: Acquire a seed and plant it within a wildseed.
QuestData.RewardText: The branches of your expertise reach for the heavens and blossom. This is good.
